title: Best of The Program | Guests: David Steinberg & Sabo | 5/19/20
description:
Why is it such a big deal that Trump is taking hydroxychloroquine? Nancy Pelosi called him “morbidly obese.” Joe Biden has a new nickname for Trump. George Soros sees the coronavirus as a “revolutionary moment” to fight climate change. Investigative reporter David Steinberg exposes Ilhan Omar’s latest sketchy campaign funding scheme. Conservative California street artist Sabo reviews his latest pieces, inspired by Gov. Newsom’s draconian shutdown orders and found at UnsavoryAgents.com.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
